name: I got CUCKED by a FUTANARI
name_original: I got CUCKED by a FUTANARI
description:
Futa on Female

Try as you might, you simply cannot please your wife--especially in the bedroom.

One unfortunate day you end up with a flat tire, and without the wherewithal to solve the problem, your wife once again goes off on a tangent about how useless you are.

Fortunately, an unlikely candidate swoops in to save the day...

Oh, and cuck you. 😏

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay
  • Kinetic Visual Novel
  • H-Scenes
  • ~4K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
